title: Coconut and sticky rice pudding with lime and papaya salad
description: Here’s a great dessert to end a Thai feast. You’ll need a visit to an Asian supermarket to source the sticky rice, lime leaves and papaya - and plenty of time for soaking the rice. Well worth it.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz palm sugar, roughly chopped if from a block
1 ripe medium papaya, seeds removed, peeled, cut into 5mm/¼in neat slices
